Quickstrike:




"On our way," Quickstrike replied to Black Arachnia. He walked to the 
confinement chamber, where he found Rattrap trying to throw the last 
of his loose objects at the control panel. They both froze and locked 
optics. Quickstrike glowered.

"All right, rat. Yer comin' wit' us."

The stepped to the control panel, and with one long digit, he turned 
off the bars. Rattrap stood. He went to bolt, but Quickstrike lunged 
at him, grabbing his shoulder. He squeezed it.

"Ya listen t' me, rat." Quickstrike grumbled. "Yer gonna listen t' 
what ah say an' do it, ya hear? Otherwise ah'm gonna slag ya."

"I like ta see ya try, two-head." Rattrap snapped back.

Quickstrike was close to punching him. "Ah got yer weapons tin-horn. 
Ya want 'em back? Ah'll give 'em back t' ya if ya listen t' me.  An' 
then maybe ah'll see what sugar-bot wants t' do wit' ya."

Rattrap narrowed his optics at him. "Whaddya want?"



Quickstrike held Rattrap by the shoulder, leading him down the 
corridor. He called to his comm-link to Paralysis: "Hey, we're 
headin' out t' meet up wit' th' others. Come get this rat."

He was ready to leave and ready the ship for arming it.
